title: The Crafty Vegetarian
description: A family run business combining social craft workshops with self-service vegetarian and vegan food. Offers a daily special menu. Offers vegan soup, vegan and veggie wraps, salads in jars, vegan fruit pies and cake, made-in-house dairy free chocolate bars, a large selection of herbal teas, coffees and made-in-house dairy free hot chocolate spoons, soy milk, almond milk and dairy milk. Vegan chili with jacket pots are available on weekends. A vegan/vegetarian high tea will be served to you on Sundays and needs to be booked in advance. A relaxed atmosphere. Buggy accessible. Parking behind the building Mon-Sat 20 pence an hour and free after 6pm, Sun and bank holidays. Letchworth train station is a five-minute walk.
